entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Friday 12 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then cloudy. Blowing snow. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Friday 12 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Friday 12 May 2023
